pages.text: The $(mob)Nine-Tails$() is a monster that spawns in Taigas of the $(thing)Overworld$(). It attacks players on sight by throwing fireballs at them from range, which set targets on fire. When reduced below 75% health, a $(mob)Nine-Tails$() engages its target in melee. $(mob)Nine-Tails$() can spawn equipped with a $(item)Hand Fan$() which increases the knockback of their attacks. $(mob)Nine-Tails$() are immune to Fire.
$(mob)Nine-Tails$() drop $(item)Soul Fire$() on death. These are an excellent source of fuel and burn for 580 seconds. Can also be used like $(item)Flint and Steel$() to start fires.
$(mob)Nine-Tails$() rarely drop $(item)Ornate Fire Fan$() on death, which is a magical melee weapon bearing the $(thing)Fire Aspect II$() and $(thing)Knockback I$() enchantments.
